column3: School of Medicine, Dentistry & Biomedical Sciences
column5: This MSc in Clinical Anatomy aims to provide students with a greater understanding of advanced human anatomy including appropriate radiological anatomy, microscopic anatomy and embryology.The modules presented emphasise clinically and surgically relevant anatomy, although they are not designed exclusively for clinicians.World Class FacilitiesQueen's is one of the few medical schools in the UK where students have access to human cadaveric teaching material in a purpose-built facility licensed by the Human Tissue Authority (HTA).
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
